00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE MACROS *************************/
00039 #define DMA_SIZE                0x100UL
00040 
00044 #define DMA_SRC                 LPC_AHBRAM1_BASE
00045 
00049 #define DMA_DST                 (DMA_SRC+DMA_SIZE)
00050 
00051 
00052 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00053 uint8_t menu1[] =
00054         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00055         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00056         "GPDMA demo \n\r"
00057         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00058         "\t - Core: ARM Cortex-M3 \n\r"
00059         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200bps \n\r"
00060         " This example used to test GPDMA function in sleep mode\n\r"
00061         " It will transfer 2 blocks of data from memory boundary \n\r"
00062         " to the other memory boundary on RAM using GPDMA module in sleep mode \n\r"
00063         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00064 uint8_t menu2[] = "Demo terminated! \n\r";
00065 uint8_t err_menu[] = "Buffer Check fail!";
00066 uint8_t compl_menu[] = "Buffer Check success!";
00067 
00068 // Terminal Counter flag for Channel 0
00069 __IO uint32_t Channel0_TC;
00070 
00071 // Error Counter flag for Channel 0
00072 __IO uint32_t Channel0_Err;
00073 
00074 
00075 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00076 void DMA_IRQHandler (void);

00078 void print_menu(void);
00079 void Buffer_Init(void);
00080 void Error_Loop(void);
00081 
00082 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00083 /*********************************************************************/
00088 void DMA_IRQHandler (void)
00089 {
00090         // check GPDMA interrupt on channel 0
00091         if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INT, 0)){ //check interrupt status on channel 0
00092                 // Check counter terminal status
00093                 if(GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTTC, 0)){
00094                         // Clear terminate counter Interrupt pending
00095                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTTC, 0);
00096                                 Channel0_TC++;
00097                 }
00098                 if (GPDMA_IntGetStatus(GPDMA_STAT_INTERR, 0)){
00099                         // Clear error counter Interrupt pending
00100                         GPDMA_ClearIntPending (GPDMA_STATCLR_INTERR, 0);
00101                         Channel0_Err++;
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 }
00105

00107 /*********************************************************************/
00112 void print_menu(void)
00113 {
00114         _DBG(menu1);
00115 }
00116 
00117 /*********************************************************************/
00122 void Buffer_Init(void)
00123 {
00124         uint8_t i;
00125         uint32_t *src_addr = (uint32_t *)DMA_SRC;
00126         uint32_t *dest_addr = (uint32_t *)DMA_DST;
00127 
00128          for ( i = 0; i < DMA_SIZE/4; i++ )
00129         {
00130                 *src_addr++ = i;
00131                 *dest_addr++ = 0;
00132         }
00133 }
00134 
00135 
00136 /*********************************************************************/
00141 void Buffer_Verify(void)
00142 {
00143         uint8_t i;
00144         uint32_t *src_addr = (uint32_t *)DMA_SRC;
00145         uint32_t *dest_addr = (uint32_t *)DMA_DST;
00146 
00147         for ( i = 0; i < DMA_SIZE/4; i++ )
00148         {
00149                 if ( *src_addr++ != *dest_addr++ )
00150                 {
00151                         /* Call Error Loop */
00152                         Error_Loop();
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 /*********************************************************************/
00163 void Error_Loop(void)
00164 {
00165         _DBG(err_menu);
00166 
00167         /* Loop forever */
00168         while (1);
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION--------------------------------*/
00173 /*********************************************************************/
00178 int c_entry(void)
00179 {
00180         GPDMA_Channel_CFG_Type GPDMACfg;
00181 
00182         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00183          * – 115200bps
00184          * – 8 data bit
00185          * – No parity
00186          * – 1 stop bit
00187          * – No flow control
00188          */
00189         debug_frmwrk_init();
00190 
00191         // print welcome screen
00192         print_menu();
00193 
00194         /* GPDMA block section -------------------------------------------- */
00195         /* Initialize buffer */
00196         _DBG_("Initialize Buffer...");
00197         Buffer_Init();
00198 
00199     /* Disable GPDMA interrupt */
00200     NVIC_DisableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00201     /* preemption = 1, sub-priority = 1 */
00202     NVIC_SetPriority(DMA_IRQn, ((0x01<<3)|0x01));
00203 
00204     /* Initialize GPDMA controller */
00205         GPDMA_Init();
00206 
00207         // Setup GPDMA channel --------------------------------
00208         // channel 0
00209         GPDMACfg.ChannelNum = 0;
00210         // Source memory
00211         GPDMACfg.SrcMemAddr = DMA_SRC;
00212         // Destination memory
00213         GPDMACfg.DstMemAddr = DMA_DST;
00214         // Transfer size
00215         GPDMACfg.TransferSize = DMA_SIZE;
00216         // Transfer width
00217         GPDMACfg.TransferWidth = GPDMA_WIDTH_WORD;
00218         // Transfer type
00219         GPDMACfg.TransferType = GPDMA_TRANSFERTYPE_M2M;
00220         // Source connection - unused
00221         GPDMACfg.SrcConn = 0;
00222         // Destination connection - unused
00223         GPDMACfg.DstConn = 0;
00224         // Linker List Item - unused
00225         GPDMACfg.DMALLI = 0;
00226         // Setup channel with given parameter
00227         GPDMA_Setup(&GPDMACfg);
00228 
00229         /* Reset terminal counter */
00230         Channel0_TC = 0;
00231         /* Reset Error counter */
00232         Channel0_Err = 0;
00233 
00234         _DBG_("Start GPDMA transfer and enter system in sleep mode...");
00235 
00236         // Enable GPDMA channel 0
00237         GPDMA_ChannelCmd(0, ENABLE);
00238 
00239         /* Enable GPDMA interrupt */
00240         NVIC_EnableIRQ(DMA_IRQn);
00241 
00242         /* Enter in sleep mode */
00243         CLKPWR_Sleep();
00244 
00245         /* Wait for GPDMA processing complete */
00246         while ((Channel0_TC == 0) && (Channel0_Err == 0));
00247 
00248         /* Verify buffer */
00249         Buffer_Verify();
00250 
00251         _DBG(compl_menu);
00252 
00253     /* Loop forever */
00254     while(1);
00255     return 1;
00256 }
00257 
00258 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00259    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00260    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00261    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00262    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00263 int main(void)
00264 {
00265     return c_entry();
00266 }

00280          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
